title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5705.3 - Parades, assemblages or demonstrations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5705.3 - Parades, assemblages or demonstrations

State Regulations
(a) No parades, assemblages or demonstrations
of any kind shall be held in or upon the facilities without the express prior
written permission of the authority. (b) Walking; bicycling. No person shall walk
or bicycle upon the facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5705.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
